1: la phan pa'i gang zag mchog /'jig rten dpe las 'das pa ste//shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog / gtso bo chos kyi sbyin pa'i bdag /phyag rgya bzhi bo'i don ston pa//'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi
2: mchog /nges 'byung gsum po bgrod rnams kyi//don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal//'jig rten gsum gyi skal bzang che// dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa//'jdam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog/
3: bya bagrub pa'i ye shes kyi tshigs su bcad pa bco lna'o////mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/ yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud//stong nyid snying po khyod la 'dud//sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud//
4: sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud//sangs rgyas 'dong la phyag 'tshal 'dud//sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud//sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud//sangs rgyas 'dum pa bhyod la 'dud//sangs
5: rgyas snang ba phyag 'tshal 'dud //sangs rgyas gsung ba khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// dngos med las byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'byund ba khyod la 'dud //nam mkha'
6: las byung khyod la 'dud//ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud//sgyu 'phrul dra bkhyod la 'dung//sangs rgyas gar mdzad khyod la 'dud/thams cang thams cad khyod la 'dud//ye shes sku khyod la 'dung do // zhes pa
7: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ye shes kyi bstod pa tshigs su bcid pa lnga'o///sag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang/'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyi shu dang/ de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi
8: sku dang/'jdam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa yongs su dag pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'o//khyod kyi zla na med pa'i dga' ba dang rab tu dang ba dang mgu ba chen po yang dag par bskyed
